sentences.en: A Luton van has additional load space over the driver's cab.
sentences.cn: 卢顿厢式货车的驾驶室上方有富余的装载空间。

sentences.en: Additional beauty treatments can be booked in advance.
sentences.cn: 额外的美容服务可以提前预订。

sentences.en: Additional courses may be taken if desired.
sentences.cn: 如有需要可选修额外的课程。

sentences.en: Additional cream would make it too rich.
sentences.cn: 再加奶油会让它过于油腻。

sentences.en: Additional information can be obtained from the centre.
sentences.cn: 可以从中心获取更多信息。

sentences.en: Additional police have been ordered out to control the expected crowds.
sentences.cn: 已增派了一些警察到那些会出现人群的地方去维持秩序.

sentences.en: I think we can fit in an additional room.
sentences.cn: 我想我们可以再加建一间房子.

sentences.en: It is necessary to set down these additional rules.
sentences.cn: 有必要制定这些补充规则.

sentences.en: Many of the additional features now cost extra.
sentences.cn: 现在很多加演节目都要另外收费.

sentences.en: Passengers have to pay additional charges for their extra luggages.
sentences.cn: 旅客们超量携带的行李要额外付费.

sentences.en: Shares and bonds can bring one quite a considerable additional income.
sentences.cn: 股票和债券能给人带来不菲的额外收入。

sentences.en: The blanket will provide additional warmth and comfort in bed.
sentences.cn: 毛毯能让你睡得更温暖、更舒适。

sentences.en: The builders will have to strengthen the existing joists with additional timber.
sentences.cn: 施工人员将不得不另外用木料加固现有的托梁。

sentences.en: The shop usually employs additional salespeople for the Christmas toy trade.
sentences.cn: 这家商店通常雇一些临时售货员来做圣诞节玩具生意.

sentences.en: There are additional publications of special relevance to new graduates.
sentences.cn: 还有对于新毕业生来说特别重要的其他出版物。

sentences.en: Why are you offering yourself for additional work?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要给自己找额外的活儿干 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）
添加；[数] 加法；增加物
增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和

phrases.tran_cn: 附加利益；额外利益；附加利益（人身保险）
追加保证金；额外的安全性

trans.tran_en: more than what was agreed or expected
